title: Ep 60: Bitches be Lyin' About Motherhood
description: In this episode my friend Cat (varsity level mom) and I discuss why bitches be lyin about having kids. YES we love our children but are we all afraid of being seen as horrible people if we admit to having unattractive feelings around parenthood? Cat and I get realer than a bitch on this episode.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
